website_summaries.verdict: This is a gorgeous watch that earns high marks for looks but has more to offer in aesthetics than it does reliability.
pros: Offers a clean, streamlined design with durable gold-tone stainless-steel workmanship
Versatile style can be worn by men or women and goes nicely with dressy attire
cons: Rare incidences of dead batteries upon delivery
Has been known to lose time

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Clean, Classy
customer_reviews.text: Love it, sleek, classy, simple, eye catching, always getting compliments every where I go. Brushed gold.
customer_reviews.author: Ian C Mathews

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars on Looks Alone
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my wrist. The gold stands out but isn't gaudy, just classy. I bought this for my dress-up watch because my Garmin really doesn't go with a suit. This is a really nice watch. I'll have to look at Nixon for other styles.
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch. Got it for my wife because she ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. Got it for my wife because she likes the "men's style" watches but it was too big and heavy for her so we returned it. She doesn't have little tiny wrists or anything, but it just was too heavy to be comfortable. I almost kept it for myself, but I just didn't need another watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It's literally a Cannon. This watch is thick.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like how big and heavy this watch was. I like to wear something that I can barely feel it's there. There is nothing about this watch that requires that kind of bulk and weight... I'm disappointed there was no side view of this watch or information that it was so big and heavy. It's not necessary, all it does is tell the time during the day. It has no date or day, the hands don't even good in the dark so why do big and bulky? Give me more features then, have it be a hybrid you certainly have the room to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the all gold Nixon about 6 months ago. I'm very happy with my purchase. It arrived quickly and in perfect condition. I get compliments on this watch all the time! I got on here today to buy a another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Turns heads everyone I go.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch I’ve had it for about 6 months now and it’s held up great. Idk what people do that this watch to scratch it so bad I take care of mine but don’t baby it and it has minimal scratches on the band. Also this is a bit of a smaller faced watch so if youre a small framed guy like myself it will look great but if you have a more bulky wrist it will look too small. And the people b*tching that you cant read the time obviously with an all black watch with no numbers presented you’re not going to be able to really read it this watch is mostly for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Mason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this watch! He only wears Nixion's, I cant believe I got it for the price I did, it basically was a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for my 20 y/o son!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one for my son's 18th bday and someone stole it...he was heartbroken. He loved this watch. So, we got him one for his 20th birthday. He is SO happy! Its a beautiful watch, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Massey

customer_reviews.title: Nixon did it again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Watch is awsome! Love Nixon watches! Not a big fan of gold but w the green face, it pops. Goes well w every attire. Clean yet chill. Originally ordered from another, had to return twice. Inside of glass was cloudy. Paid a little more ordering from Nixon but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: eL

customer_reviews.title: This watch is totally cool. Looks more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.text: This watch is totally cool. Looks more expensive than it is. Good for both men or women who like a watch with a larger face. It's a bit heavy-feeling on the wrist but I like that. I have a small wrist (5 inches around) and I was able have a watch serviceman remove a few links to make it fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend always wanted to have a gold watch, so I decided to look online to see if they have any good gold watches for not too much. This watch is perfect it’s been about a year and it still looks amazing and he wears it almost every day
customer_reviews.author: Taria Adams

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a collector, nor am I very knowledgeable of watches. But this looks great, feels great and is accurate. I needed a good quality watch that looked good and I found it. Worth the buy, may buy another for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: which is attractive and the watch has great weight to it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother, who absolutely LOVES it! It looks elegant and fit her perfectly. He is especially fond of the gunmetal gray background and the rose gold markings. The combination has an upscale look that goes with everything he wears. The face of the watch stands up a fair amount, which is attractive and the watch has great weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Christi R. Siedlecki

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: They really liked it. I got the black on black and it’s pretty amazing looking.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Watch face on this is pretty thick for those that like a sleeker watch but I bought this for my younger brother for Christmas and he loved it. Overall, it’s a nice watch
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and weight. Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: This watch is luxury. Makes me feel like a million bucks
customer_reviews.author: Chase Vines

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the watch yesterday and literally Received it today I was amazed. I personally loved the watch and I think my man will love it more I got it for him for a Valentine's Day gift. I was nervous purchasing it based off some reviews from previous people but I'm glad I did buy it. Only reason why I gave 4 stars is because I bought it yesterday for $100 and it went down almost $20 the following day that sucks but other then that no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Vallerie

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice looking watch but the case was too small for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking watch but the case was too small for my wrist. I ended up going with the Nixon Corporal SS with the orange highlighted hands and I totally love it. This would be a good watch for somebody with standard to smallish wrists.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was great till my brother took it, still great watch (now on his wrist).

customer_reviews.title: eye catching watch for a really great price. He always gets compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: Husband had this same that I got him years ago as a wedding anniversary gift. Last spring on our way back from the Dominican, it got stolen at the DR airport. Ordered this as a surprise and he was totally shocked. Such a sharp looking, eye catching watch for a really great price. He always gets compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 year old son. He's really happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Very smart looking. This is my 8th Nixon watch.

customer_reviews.title: This is now my new favorite! At around $100 how can you beat the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have many watches in my collection, from Invictas to Woehler. This is now my new favorite! At around $100 how can you beat the look and the stlye, it puts my $600 watch to shame.

customer_reviews.title: nice watch

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I bought it for my boyfriend like a B-Day present and he love it... Plus, great price! Is a very nice watch and heavy, looks beautiful. I'm more than Happy with this Nixon all gold Watch :)

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite watch. Already recieved several compliments and draws the ...
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite watch. Already recieved several compliments and draws the attention of quite a few wandering eyes. Would recommend this seller and this watch. Excellent shipping also.

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Took it to a local well respected jeweler who was unable to install a battery or add links due to not being authentic.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch at an amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is amazingly good looking! The price is unbeatable as well. I went shopping for a watch and found this at 149.99, I searched here and was surprised at the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Garza

customer_reviews.title: I use this watch like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I use this watch like a champ. I sold the Seiko and purchased this one. I say it is a perfect size for a medium build guy. If you are over 5'9 or over 190lbs your wrist might be too large for this watch. The gold color is wonderful during summer.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto A. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but too dark
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made beautiful watch but I had to return it because I couldn't tell the time! It's too dark. There is no illumination so forget trying to see what time it is at night. Even during the day I had to squint to try and see what time it was. Now maybe some could fair better than me but I seriously had a hard time telling the time. Any way if the clock dials were white or another color this would have been a clutch watch.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great watch...terrible seller!!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is gorgeous and Nixon watches are great. The seller removed the links. The watch was kid-sized when it arrived. I wanted to have it for the holiday, but I am returning instead. 😐
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, is casual enough to wear it everyday

customer_reviews.title: I've received compliments on this watch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch a few months ago. Since then a few people have complimented my watch. The face is contemporary looking.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves my watch.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how many compliments I get on this beautiful watch. People have ran to the computer and ordered it once they find out how affordable it is. It is easily the nicest watch for the price on the market. The only downside is that it is very, very heavy.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for a great price

product_meta.title: NIXON Cannon A160-100m Water Resistant Men's Analog Fashion Watch (39.5 mm Watch Face, 26-23 mm Stainless Steel Band)
product_meta.description:
Boom! There goes that goodness with The Cannon watch from Nixon®. Custom solid stainless steel case. Hardened mineral crystal. Triple gasket stainless steel crown and a stainless steel screw down caseback with spring pin lugs. Tapered stainless steel three-link bracelet with a stainless steel double locking clasp with micro adjust. Miyota Japanese quartz three-hand movement. Dial features:• Surrounded by a large solid stainless steel indices.• Custom molded hands. Water resistant up to 100 meters. Imported. Measurements: Case Height: 40 mm Case Width: 39 mm Case Depth: 11 mm Band Width: 1 in Band Circumference/Length: 10 in Weight: 5.6 oz This product may have a manufacturer's warranty. Please visit the manufacturer's website or contact us at warranty@support.zappos.com for full manufacturer warranty details.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5.91 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 10.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :A160-502
 * Department :Unisex
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :September 26, 2014
 * Manufacturer :NIXON
 * ASIN :B004PV1WJS

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #124,372 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #732 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #24 inMen's Contemporary & Designer Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars375 ratings Boom! There goes that goodness with The Cannon watch from Nixon®. Custom solid stainless steel case. Hardened mineral crystal. Triple gasket stainless steel crown and a stainless steel screw down caseback with spring pin lugs. Tapered stainless steel three-link bracelet with a stainless steel double locking clasp with micro adjust. Miyota Japanese quartz three-hand movement. Dial features:• Surrounded by a large solid stainless steel indices.• Custom molded hands. Water resistant up to 100 meters. Imported. Measurements: Case Height: 40 mm Case Width: 39 mm Case Depth: 11 mm Band Width: 1 in Band Circumference/Length: 10 in Weight: 5.6 oz This product may have a manufacturer's warranty. Please visit the manufacturer's website or contact us at warranty@support.zappos.com for full manufacturer warranty details.
feature_bullets: A brand-new, unused, and unworn item (including handmade items) in the original packaging (such as the original box or bag) and/or with the original tags attached.
Gold-tone stainless steel case and bracelet
